Agenda

Major points

  • Long term goals
  • Short term goals including making Trac tickets for them.
  • Release cycle and release manager.
  • Starters guides for new developers (All areas including: code, art, settings, etc).
  • Open discussion
  • Discuss the things below

Things to discuss

  • Code
    • Peragro Tempus code redesign.
    • Change server code to update DB entries when parsing xml files at startup. (azaghal)
    • Dissccus the implementation of scripting server/client-side. (azaghal)
    • Implement appropriate classes as singeltons (azaghal)
    • Change some classes to be pure virtual classes (like Entity) (azaghal)
    • Implement copy constructors and assignment operator for all dynamic classes. (azaghal)
    • Dynamicly loading and unloading parts of the world.
    • Implement game-state manager singleton class. (azaghal)
    • Collision checking and player cheating prevention server side. <Levia> Impossible. Will discuss.
    • Implement a proper bobbing effect for camera in first-person mode. (azaghal)
    • < Hooloovoo> CyaNox: What about discussing how to make the character easier to control?
    • we need to do Dead Reckoning and interpolation
    • event renaming, TypeEventName to type.eventname
  • Art and code
    • Morning/Day/Evening/Night lighting for maps. (azaghal)
    • Implementing zones. How and what exactly.
    • Separate graphics data form non graphics data (azaghal)

Long term goals

  • No code should be designed and written by one person.
  • Code should be designed first and possibly have several iterations of review by others before writing.
  • Each commit should be reviewed. CyaNox will either write or make a (web based) utility available to aid in this.

Starter guides

  • No starters guides will be written.
  • Documentation is going to be the coders starting guide. This means documentation now has a much higher priority.

Code Decisions

  • Map out current features and possibly more for the redesign.
  • All discussion topics have been skipped due to the upcoming redesign meeting. They may not come back since their relevance might not be valid. But will remain in this agenda as history.

The rest

IRC Logs Meeting started at around 20:01:10 and ended around 22:07:09. Note however that the redesign pre-discussion continued till much later (23:08:49) and hopped to the #peragro-dev channel.

The rest of the code related meeting will be reviewed in Meetings/03-11-2007. The rest of the redesign dicussions will be in the meeting that follows it: Meetings/Redesign.
